description: Concatenate a combination of input LTAs (linear transform array) and GCAMs (Gaussian classifier atlas, M3Z).

inputs.title: Input Transforms
inputs.description: Combination of input LTAs and M3Zs.

output.title: Output Transform
output.description: Concatenated output transform, saved as an LTA or M3Z depending on the input transforms.

source_image.title: Change Source Image
source_image.description: Change source image geometry of output M3Z, useful for GCAM inversion if the path of the original source volume changed.

target_image.title: Change Target Image
target_image.description: Change destination image geometry of output M3Z.

reduce.title: Reduce LTA
reduce.description: Reduce output LTA to single LT.

downsample.title: Downsample M3Z
downsample.description: Downsample output M3Z to spacing of 2; by default, the output spacing is that of the rightmost input M3Z.
